page.title: 11COMMUNICATIONS
page.content:
There is a Post Office in{Thornton {Watlass;}it is in the front room of a house. It deals with letters,parcels, stamps and pensions,and opens on Mondays,Tuesdays, Wednesdays and Fridays from 9am. to 12 noon, then reopens from 1pm. to 5.30pm. in the afternoons. It opens on Thursdays and Saturdays from 9am. to 12.30pm.
There is no other post office in our area, only post boxes.
The Post van takes the letters to Ripon,Leeds and Harrogate and comes twice a day. It has been coming for 14 years.
There is also a post bus which takes people to Ripon because there is no public transport except on Thursdays.
